Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Two little Fugues (Versets), KV 154a/Anh. A 61–62

c. 1772–1773 · KV1 – · KV2 154a · KV3 Anh. 109/VIII · KV6 Anh. A 61 + Anh. A 62

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 1'

  • 1. G major
  • 2. D major

These two fugues are for organ, but can be played effectively on the piano. It is unknown whether the fugues are original compositions by Mozart, or by someone else and later copied by Mozart.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/27/2 · BA 4584-02 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Einzelstücke · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5745 · Einzelstücke für Klavier · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Henle · HN 22 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 23 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler

1. G major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. D major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
